summary: David's brother, Kurt, defeats Po in Kickboxer (1989). A year after Po kills Kurt, David, who has a kickboxing gym in LA, is manipulated into a match against Po.
cast: Sasha Mitchell|Peter Boyle|Dennis Chan|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|John Diehl|Michel Qissi|Heather McComb|Vince Murdocco|Humberto Ortiz|Matthias Hues|Emmanuel Kervyn|Joe Restivo|Vincent Klyn|Brian Austin Green|Brent Kelly|Annie O'Donnell|Christian Andrews|Jay Byron|Gene LeBell|Dale Jacoby|Robert Gottlieb|Tony Fasce|Alfred Urquidez|Abraham Hernandez Jr.|Don Familton|Jeff Mulvin|Mark Roemer|Amy Arthur|Dorothy Dells|Corinne Oliva|Lisa Capperino|Casey Stengel|Debrae Barensfeld|Ed Anders|Chance Michael Corbitt|Charles D. keywords: kickboxer|sequel|death of brother|karate|sequel to cult film
title: Kickboxer II: La Venganza
